title: Launguage filter in game buggy
body: Hey whoever sees this. probably targon or someone. But I don't know if this is a alpha client problem or legacy client. The language filer wont disable. I am not trying to cuss out my team don't worry, I have good sportsman ship. It's just the way I talk. a good play will always end in "GOD DAMN". so anyways. I disabled the language filter in both clients and its still blocking everything in game. ONLY in game. Normal chat its fine so I'm am totally lost. What can I do to disable the language filter

replies.body:
Ugh, this bug is really annoying, so let's try to sort this out! Go into the settings and **enable** the filter, then hit **DONE**. Go back into the settings and then **disable** the filter, then hit **DONE** again.

Let me know if this fixed it!

Its 50/50 on working it seems. Itll be on and off depending on time. I have tried that. thought that refreshing the basic setting like that would work and it did for a couple games then it started giving me **** again. I will continue to do that because it seems to work temporarily but  is it probably gonna be fixed next patch?

Others have reported it being an 'on and off' type experience as well. I can't provide an estimate for when you'll see a fix go out for this, but we're aware of the issue. Since I don't work on the teams that would develop a fix for this, I don't have any other information to share.

If you have any other questions, let me know.

I appreciate the help you give, not just me but for the whole community. Thanks for keeping up, and letting me know that the problem doesn't just occur to me. I'm glad to see that riot is aware of the problem and working on it, while it might not be you but all employees. Thank you
Someone told me in a thread that doing it through chat commands ingame works
